summary.p: This version of the Vikramacarita, here titled Dvātriṃśatputtalikāsiṃhāsana, was first edited by Jīvānanda Vidyāsāgara in 1881. The present edition seems to be the third, from 1938, since it incorporates errata noted in the 1916 edition. Franklin Edgerton used the 1881 text as a witness for the southern recension in his own edition; Edgerton's text is more complete, with respect to the parallels with the Vahnipurāṇa.
This copy was digitized by eGangotri in 2022.

lg.l: tyaktvā''tmasukhaduḥkhecchāṃ sarvvasattvaguṇaiṣiṇaḥ |
bhavanti paraduḥkhena sādhavo 'tyantaduḥkhinaḥ || 150 ||
paropakāraniratā ye svārthasukhanispṛhāḥ |
jagaddhitāya janitāḥ sādhavas tv īdṛśā bhuvi” || 151 ||

body.p:
evaṃ vicāryya sa rājānam abravīt, ―“bhoḥ mahāpuruṣaḥ ! tvaṃ
sarvvasyārtthiharo guruḥ, yataḥ tvaṃ viśvasyārtthiṃ pariharasi | parārthaṃ
śarīraṃ prayacchatas tavaiva etac charīraṃ ślāghyamślāgyaṃ ― praśaṃsanīyam | | kutaḥ ―

lg.l: paśavo 'pi hi jīvanti kevalaṃ svodarambharāḥ |
tasyaiva jīvitaṃ ślāghyaṃ yaḥ parārthe hi jīvati 152 ||

body.p: bhavādṛśāṃ paropakāriṇām etac citraṃ na bhavati | tathā coktam, ―

lg.l: kim atra citram ? yat_ santaḥ parānugrahatatparāḥ |
na hi svadehaśaityāya jāyante candanadrumāḥ || 153 ||

body.p:
bho mahāsattva ! anenaiva paropakāreṇa tvaṃ sarvāḥ sampadaḥ
prāpnoṣi | pad uktam, ―

lg.l: paropakāravyāpāro puruṣo yaḥ prajāyate |
sampadaṃ sa samāpnoti paratrā'pi paraṃ padam” || 154 ||

body.p:
evaṃ bhaṇitvā punaḥ rājānam abravīt, ― “bho mahāsattva !
tavāhaṃ tuṣṭo 'smi, varaṃ vṛṇīṣva” | rājoktaṃ, ― “bho rākṣasa ! tvaṃ
yadi mama prasanno 'smi, tarhy adya prabhṛti manuṣyabhakṣaṇaṃ parityaja |
anyam api mayā abhidhīyamānam upadeśaṃ śṛṇu | ―

lg.l: yathā''tmanaḥ priyāḥ prāṇāḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā |
tasmān mṛtyubhayāt_ te 'pi trātavyāḥ prāṇino budhaiḥ || 155 ||
janma-mṛtyu-jarā-duḥkhair nityaṃ saṃsārasāgare |
kliśyanti jantavo ghore marttyās trasyanti mṛtyutaḥ || 156 ||
mariṣyāmīti yad_ duḥkhaṃ puruṣasyopajāyate |
śakyate nānumānena tad vaktuṃ kenacit_ kvacit || 157 ||

yathā bhavej jīvitam ātmanaḥ priyaṃ
tathā pareṣām api jīvitaṃ priyam |

nirīkṣyate jīvitam ātmano yathā
tathā pareṣām api rakṣa jīvitam” || 158 ||

body.p:
rājñā iti nirūpitaḥnirūpitaḥ, ― upadiṣṭaḥ ity arthaḥ | rākṣasaḥ tadāprabhṛti jīva
māraṇaṃ tatyāja | rājā ca svanagarīṃ pratyagāt” |

lg.l: “anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhave naiva śāśvataḥ |
nityaṃ sannihito mṛtyuḥ karttavyo dharmmasaṅgrahaḥ || 169 ||
śrūyatāṃ dharmmasarvvasvaṃ yad uktaṃ granthakoṭibhiḥ |
paropakāraḥ puṇyāya pāpāya parapīḍanam || 170 ||
yo duḥkhitāni bhūtāni dṛṣṭvā bhavati duḥkhitaḥ |
sukhitāni sukhī vā'pi sa dharmaṃ veda naiṣṭhikam || 191 ||
jāne bhūyāṃs tato dharmmaḥ kaścin nānyo 'sti dehinaḥ |
prāṇināṃ bhayabhītānām abhayaṃ yaḥ prayacchati || 172 ||
varam ekasya trastasya pradātur jīvitaṃ phalam |
na ca viprasahasrebhyo gosahasraṃ phalaṃ bhavet || 173 ||
abhayaṃ sarvvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ |
tasya puṇyasya kalpānte kṣaya eva na vidyate || 174 ||
hema-dhenu-dharādīnāṃ dātāraḥ sulabhā bhuvi |
durlabhaḥ puruṣo loke sarvvajīve dayāparaḥ || 175 ||
mahatām api yajñānāṃ kālena kṣīyate phalam |
tac cābhayapradānasya kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm || 176 ||
catuḥsāgaraparyyantāṃ yo dadyād vasudhām imām |
yac cābhayañ ca bhūtebhyas tayor abhayado 'dhikaḥ || 177 ||
adhruveṇa śarīreṇa pratikṣaṇavināśinā |
dhruvaṃ yo nā''rjjayet_ dharmmaṃ sa śocyo mūḍhacetanaḥ || 178 ||
yadi prāṇyupakārāya deho 'yaṃ nopayujyate |
tataḥ kiṃ poṣaṇaṃ tasya pratyahaṃ kriyate nṛbhiḥ ?" || 179 ||
